channel.title: I'm a Wordpress monkey and a wannabe professional RoR developer
channel.description:
So lovely to meet you!
This forum looks awesome, not in the least because it's done in Ruby on Rails and Ember. I have a small freelance web development company. Almost all my work is basic Wordpress stuff. Setting up Wordpress sites and doing small fixes for clients.
What I really want to do is make great Ruby on Rails apps (kind of like this one) but I have no idea where to get clients for that, or what apps the market needs.
So I'm here to meet some awesome people who love development as much as I do and passionately believe that great apps can make the world a better place. Oh and I'm from Sweden, the land of meatballs, gooey chocolate cake and [this guy][1].
[1]: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHzQZWnBJrE

item.title: I'm a Wordpress monkey and a wannabe professional RoR developer
item.dc:creator: aakilfernandes
item.description:
Nice to meet you Layla!

item.description:
So lovely to meet you!

This forum looks awesome, not in the least because it’s done in Ruby on Rails and Ember. I have a small freelance web development company. Almost all my work is basic Wordpress stuff. Setting up Wordpress sites and doing small fixes for clients.

What I really want to do is make great Ruby on Rails apps (kind of like this one) but I have no idea where to get clients for that, or what apps the market needs.

So I’m here to meet some awesome people who love development as much as I do and passionately believe that great apps can make the world a better place. Oh and I’m from Sweden, the land of meatballs, gooey chocolate cake and this guy.
